newResponses.title: New responses available
newResponses.message2: Start by downloading responses and then sign off for their removal from GC Forms.

downloadedResponses.title: Recently downloaded responses
downloadedResponses.message2: You must sign off on the removal of responses from GC Forms within the time indicated.

confirmedResponses.title: Responses signed off for removal
confirmedResponses.message1: GC Forms stores responses temporarily. These responses will be removed permanently after 30 days.

problemResponses.title: Responses reported with problems
problemResponses.message1: The GC Forms Support Team has been notified.
problemResponses.message2: Someone will reach out to help resolve the problem. Sign off on the removal of these problem responses once resolved.

responses.confirmReceipt: Sign off on removal with receipt codes
responses.title: Responses

unauthenticated.noAccount: If you do not have a GC Forms account,
unauthenticated.title: Sign in to access responses

responses.viewAllProblemResponses: View all responses reported as problems

downloadSuccess.title: Responses moved to Downloaded
downloadSuccess.body: Next: sign off on the removal of responses from GC Forms.

confirmSuccess.title: Responses moved to Signed off for removal
confirmSuccess.body: Responses will be removed in 30 days.

status.confirmWithinXDays: Sign off on removal within {{daysLeft}} days
status.removeWithinXDays: Will be removed permanently in {{daysLeft}} days

card.noNewResponsesMessage: Submitted form responses will appear here and be available in GC Forms for 45 days.
card.noDownloadedResponsesMessage: Downloaded responses will appear here until you sign off on their removal from GC Forms.
card.noDeletedResponsesMessage: Once you’ve downloaded and signed off on the removal of responses, they will be available here for 30 days.
card.noProblemResponsesMessage: Problem responses will appear here until you sign off on their removal from GC Forms.

notifications.downloadCompleteNew: Next: Sign off on the removal of responses from GC Forms

errors.trySelectingLessFilesHeader: Only {{max}} responses can be downloaded at a time.
errors.trySelectingLessFiles: You have {{max}} responses selected. Uncheck at least 1 response before downloading.
errors.atLeastOneFileHeader: At least one file must be selected to download.
errors.atLeastOneFile: Try selecting at least one file to download.
errors.errorDownloadingFiles: Try again in a few minutes. If the problem persists,
errors.remainingResponsesBody: Showing 1-{{max}}. More will load as displayed responses are downloaded.

overdueAlert.title: Access to new responses is restricted until overdue responses are downloaded and confirmed
overdueAlert.description: There are {{numberOfOverdueResponses}} unconfirmed responses that are {{escalatedAfter}} days old. Download and confirm all overdue responses to remove this restriction.

downloadDialog.title: Download responses
downloadDialog.chooseDownloadFormat: Choose the format of response files
downloadDialog.downloadFormatContext: You’ll also get an Official receipt and record of responses. You’ll need to keep this receipt to verify all responses made it safely from GC Forms to your computer.
downloadDialog.htmlDescription: Separate files for each form submission
downloadDialog.downloadAllAsZip: Download all files as ZIP (compressed) file

confirmDeleteNewDialog.alertBody: You’ve not downloaded the responses you’re about to delete. If you delete these responses, they will be removed permanently from GC Forms after 30 days.
confirmDeleteNewDialog.deletePrompt: To proceed with deleting non-downloaded responses enter the word “DELETE” below.

confirmReceiptDialog.title: Sign off on the removal of responses from GC Forms
confirmReceiptDialog.contentHeading: GC Forms requires verification that responses were downloaded successfully
confirmReceiptDialog.contentBody: Why? Because things can go wrong when digital files move between computers. GC Forms will not remove responses from the database without having verified that all files made it safely to your computer.
confirmReceiptDialog.copyCode: Paste receipt codes from the Official receipt and record of responses to confirm you have responses.
confirmReceiptDialog.copyCodeNote: Use the “Copy receipt codes” button at the top of the receipt file.
confirmReceiptDialog.confirmReceipt: Sign off on removal of responses

minEntries.title: At least one response must be specified
minEntries.description: Enter receipt codes from downloaded responses to confirm having received them.

maxEntries.title: Only {{max}} responses can be reported at a time.
maxEntries.description: Submit {{max}} receipt codes before adding more.

errorEntries.title: Some receipt codes could not be submitted
errorEntries.description: Check that the receipt codes below are correct and try again.

invalidEntry.title: The receipt code does not match the required format
invalidEntry.description: Check that the receipt code format is correct and try again.

unknown.title: Sorry, there’s a problem with the site
unknown.description: Wait a few minutes and try again, or

reportProblemsDialog.title: Report a problem with responses
reportProblemsDialog.findForm: Find the submission ID in the list for responses that will not download or open. It looks like 31-12-XCRV.
reportProblemsDialog.enterFormNumbers: Enter up-to {{max}} submission IDs, one per line.
reportProblemsDialog.problemReported: After you report the problem, we will contact you to help resolve the problem.

minEntries.title: At least one submission must be specified
minEntries.description: Enter submission IDs for responses that have a problem.

maxEntries.title: Only {{max}} problems can be reported at a time
maxEntries.description: Submit {{max}} submission IDs before adding more.

errorEntries.title: Some submission IDs were not submitted
errorEntries.description: Check that the submission ID below are correct and try again.

invalidEntry.title: The submission ID does not match the required format
invalidEntry.description: Check that the submission ID format is correct and try again.

unknown.title: Sorry, there’s a problem with the site
unknown.description: Wait a few minutes and try again, or
